document.full_text: saudi billionaire prince alwaleed bin talal is considering to buy a controlling stake in kuwaiti telecom firm zain  at a price of 1.7 dinars ($6.12) per share, a newspaper reported...
document.title: saudi prince alwaleed mulls kuwait's zain buy: report
lines_and_colors: saudi billionaire prince alwaleed bin talal is considering to buy a controlling stake in kuwaiti telecom firm zain  at a price of 1.7 dinars ($6.12) per share, a newspaper reported...
